species.Description: binomial species name from NCBI Taxonomy (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi)

strain_ilar.Description: string value indicating the strain and laboratory registry code from https://www.nationalacademies.org/ilar/lab-code-database

strain_rrid.Description: research resource identifier of the strain of the species from https://scicrunch.org/resources/data/source/nlx_154697-1/search

age.Description: Age of the animal at first acquisition, in weeks.

weight.Description: Weight of the animal on the day of surgery, in grams.
